articles.description: CSK fielding coach Rajiv Kumar shared some insights about MS Dhoni’s first week in the nets. In Episode 1 of AnbuDen Diaries (CSK’s video series on social media), Rajiv Kumar explains how Dhoni is gearing up for IPL 2021.
articles.content: Chennai Super Kings (CSK) captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni has already begun his preparations for the upcoming season of the Indian Premier League which commences on April 9 in Chennai. The Dhoni-led sid… [+1600 chars]
